plugins.name: browser-automation
plugins.description: Automates browser interactions using Playwright CLI and templates for screenshots, PDFs, form filling, and monitoring.

plugins.name: consulting-peer-llms
plugins.description: Execute peer reviews from other LLM tools (Gemini, Codex) in parallel and synthesize actionable insights.

plugins.name: managing-git-workflow
plugins.description: Automates git commits, push, and PR creation with context-aware messages and ticket extraction.

plugins.name: understanding-code-context
plugins.description: Efficient code exploration using LSP symbolic tools (Serena) and official documentation (Context7).

plugins.name: coderabbit-feedback
plugins.description: Interactive CodeRabbit review processing with severity classification and verified completion workflow.
